title: Orange Field
credit_line: Patrons Art Fund and gift of James I. Merrill by exchange
provenance_text:
Grace Hartigan [1922-2008], New York, NY; Tibor de Nagy Gallery, New York, NY, until January 1959 [1]; purchased by Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, December 1958 [2].

Notes:
[1]. The painting was exhibited (no. 200) in "The 1958 Pittsburgh Bicentennial International Exhibition of Contemporary Painting and Sculpture" held at Carnegie Institute, December 1958 - February 1959. It was lent by Tibor de Nagy Gallery.
[2]. The painting was accessioned on December 17, 1958. It was acquired by Carnegie Institute from the International, in part by exchange of another Hartigan painting, "Hester and Essex (Green.) Additional payment was sent to Tibor de Nagy Gallery on January 12, 1959.

creator.birth_place: Newark (Essex county, New Jersey, United States)
creator.death_place: Baltimore (Baltimore Independent City, Maryland, United States)
